title: The Official Tony Abbott Appreciation Thread
body:
You AUs are an awfully salty folk. You focus too much on the bad and not enough of the good. Even some of the die hard liberals here have some good things to say about Bush Jr. I really do mean you will one day regret ousting them when the SJWs take your country over.

Anyways, share some of the good things Mr. Abbott did in this thread right here or some good memories you've had with them.

I'll start, they're SO hot omg:
http://i.imgur.com/Sw3YYxZ.png
